com.sizzo.something.data
类 AbstractSizzoProvider

java.lang.Object
  android.content.ContentProvider
      com.sizzo.something.data.AbstractSizzoProvider
所有已实现的接口：
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2, android.database.sqlite.SQLiteTransactionListener
直接已知子类：
SizzoProvider
public abstract class AbstractSizzoProvider
extends android.content.ContentProvider
implements android.database.sqlite.SQLiteTransactionListener

A common base class for the contacts and profile providers. This handles much of the same logic that SQLiteContentProvider does (i.e. starting transactions on the appropriate database), but exposes awareness of batch operations to the subclass so that cross-database operations can be supported.

setDbHelperToSerializeOn

public void setDbHelperToSerializeOn(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper serializeOnDbHelper,
                                     String tag)
Specifies a database helper (and corresponding tag) to serialize all transactions on.

参数：
serializeOnDbHelper - The database helper to use for serializing transactions.
tag - The tag for this database.

getDatabaseHelper

protected abstract android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper getDatabaseHelper(android.content.Context context)
Gets the database helper for this contacts provider. This is called once, during onCreate().

getTransactionHolder

protected abstract ThreadLocal<SizzoTransaction> getTransactionHolder()
Gets the thread-local transaction holder to use for keeping track of the transaction. This is called once, in onCreate(). If multiple classes are inheriting from this class that need to be kept in sync on the same transaction, they must all return the same thread-local.
